node.statement: PART III (Topological regime, q = exp(2πi/r) — CONJECTURAL): At q = exp(2πi/r), the representation theory of U_q(su(2)) truncates (j ≤ (r-2)/2). The quantum 6j symbols become building blocks of the Turaev-Viro state sum TV_r(M) = D^{-2v} sum prod [2j_e+1]_q prod |{6j}_q|^2, a topological invariant satisfying TV_r = |tau_r|^2 (Turaev-Walker). The non-melonic corrections in this regime are controlled by topological 3D gravity (Euclidean 3D gravity with Lambda ~ 1/k^2). The limit r -> infinity recovers regime I. NOTE: This regime requires q complex (|q|=1), a qualitative change from q > 0 real in Parts 0-II, requiring analytic continuation.
